    • interact

      public void interact​(Vector gameObjectPos, boolean useItem)
      Interact. Interacts with the GameObject at the given position of the current rooms Room.getRoomGrid(). If param useItem is true then the player will interact upon the GameObject using the players Inventory.getSelectedItem().
      Parameters:
      gameObjectPos - the game object pos
      useItem - the use item

    • reconfigureRooms

      public void reconfigureRooms()
      Reconfigure rooms. Reconnects the rooms Room.exitsProperty() after serialization using Room.exitStringsProperty().

    • findRoom

      private Room findRoom​(java.lang.String shortDescription)
      Find room using Room.getShortDescription().
      Parameters:
      shortDescription - the short description
      Returns:
      the room

      public void createRooms()
      Create rooms. Redundant.

      public void play()
      Parse command line interface input as Command. Redundant.

    • enableGameUpdater

      private void enableGameUpdater()
      Enable game updater. Redundant.

    • update

      public void update()
      Update all rooms. Calls the Room.update() in all rooms that exist in rooms processes the commands using processCommandInternal(Command[])

    • processCommand

      private boolean processCommand​(Command command)
      Process command boolean.
      Parameters:
      command - the command
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • selectItem

      private void selectItem​(Command command)
      Select item. Processes the CommandWord.SELECT command. If Command.getSecondWord() is not null and is a valid integer, the players selected item will be the one at the given index in their inventory. Sets the selected player item to Command.getItem() if one is present.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • processCommandInternal

      private void processCommandInternal​(Command command)
      Process command internal. Meant for processing commands that the player ought not have access to.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • addItem

      private void addItem​(Command command)
      Add item.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • processCommandInternal

      private void processCommandInternal​(Command[] commands)
      Process command internal. Calls processCommand(Command)
      Parameters:
      commands - the commands

    • interactPlayer

      private void interactPlayer()
      Interact player. Interact with the GameObject the player resides in.

    • removeItem

      private void removeItem​(Command command)
      Remove item.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • printHelp

      private void printHelp()
      Print help.

    • goRoom

      private void goRoom​(Command command)
      Go room. Changes the current room the the one that corresponds the the value defined in their Room.exitsProperty() using the parameters Command.getSecondWord() as the key.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • movePlayer

      private void movePlayer​(Command command)
      Move player. Constructs a Direction using the Command.getSecondWord() and moves the player in that direction. If one cannot be constructed or the the canPlayerMoveToPoint(int, int) is false, nothing will happen.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • teleportPlayer

      private void teleportPlayer​(Command command)
      Teleport player. Constructs a Vector using the parameters Command.getSecondWord() and attempts to teleport the player to the Vector position. If one cannot be constructed or the the canPlayerMoveToPoint(int, int) is false, nothing will happen.
      Parameters:
      command - the command

    • setPlayerPosition

      private void setPlayerPosition​(Vector position)
      Sets player position. Handles entry and exit of GameObjects.
      Parameters:
      position - the position

    • canPlayerMoveToPoint

      private boolean canPlayerMoveToPoint​(int x, int y)
      Can player move to point boolean.
      Parameters:
      x - the x
      y - the y
      Returns:
      the boolean
